name: DHRUVH

address: NAYA BASTI ROAD (Behind Main Bus Stop) DEVLI

briefDescription: 	The word DHRUVH taken from the pole star-'Dhruvh-tara' or 'Dhruvh-star' surrounded by seven stars called Saptarishi (in India) or Great Bear, which is static and always guide passerby specially the sailors to get right way since the ancient time when compass etc was not invented. We hope to bring a drastic positive change in society and wish others will follow us to form an equal society in letter and spirit.	The addenda words “Social Awareness Forum” use with the name “DHRUVH” in English and in Hindi translation it read as “samajik jagaran manch” to clarify the nature of work - committed to the cause of making people aware towards rights & duty -by the name itself. Our logo consists of both the version of addenda words with original name.
